data_table.description: Form 154 - Breast Health Supplement to the Medication Inventory (WHI Extension 1 Study)

variable.name: F154VY
variable.comment: Visit year in which this form was collected.

variable.name: F154DAYS
variable.comment: Days since randomization or enrollment to receipt of form

variable.name: BCTAMOX
variable.comment: Since your breast cancer diagnosis: Have you ever taken tamoxifen (Novadex)?

variable.name: BCTAMOXDUR
variable.comment: Since your breast cancer diagnosis: How long did you take or have you taken tamoxifen?

variable.name: BCRALOX
variable.comment: Since your breast cancer diagnosis: Have you ever taken raloxifene (Evista)?

variable.name: BCRALOXDUR
variable.comment: Since your breast cancer diagnosis: How long did you take or have you taken raloxifene?

variable.name: BCTOREM
variable.comment: Since your breast cancer diagnosis: Have you ever taken toremifene (Fareston)?

variable.name: BCTOREMDUR
variable.comment: Since your breast cancer diagnosis: How long did you take or have you taken toremifene?

variable.name: BCANAST
variable.comment: Since your breast cancer diagnosis: Have you ever taken anastrozole (Arimidex)?

variable.name: BCANASTDUR
variable.comment: Since your breast cancer diagnosis: How long did you take or have you taken anastrozole?

variable.name: BCEXEME
variable.comment: Since your breast cancer diagnosis: Have you ever taken exemestane (Aromasin)?

variable.name: BCEXEMEDUR
variable.comment: Since your breast cancer diagnosis: How long did you take or have you taken exemestane?

variable.name: BCLETRO
variable.comment: Since your breast cancer diagnosis: Have you ever taken letrozole (Femara)?

variable.name: BCLETRODUR
variable.comment: Since your breast cancer diagnosis: How long did you take or have you taken letrozole?

variable.name: BCSERM
variable.description: Ever taken other SERM or aromatase inhibitor
variable.comment: Since your breast cancer diagnosis: Have you ever taken any SERM or aromatase inhibitor that is not listed above or that you may not recall the name of?

variable.name: BCSERMDUR
variable.description: How long taken this other SERM or aromatase inhibitor
variable.comment: Since your breast cancer diagnosis: How long did you take or have you taken this medication (other SERM or aromatase inhibitor)?

variable.name: BCBNONE
variable.comment: Have any of the following barriers prevented you from obtaining or taking the prescribed breast cancer medications previously asked about (i.e. tamoxifen, raloxifene, toremifene, anastrazole, exemestane, and letrozole)?: I did not experience any barriers to taking these medications.

variable.name: BCBNOHEAR
variable.comment: Have any of the following barriers prevented you from obtaining or taking the prescribed breast cancer medications previously asked about (i.e. tamoxifen, raloxifene, toremifene, anastrazole, exemestane, and letrozole)?: I have never heard of these medications.

variable.name: BCBNOINSUR
variable.description: Barrier-insurance would not cover these meds
variable.comment: Have any of the following barriers prevented you from obtaining or taking the prescribed breast cancer medications previously asked about (i.e. tamoxifen, raloxifene, toremifene, anastrazole, exemestane, and letrozole)?: My health insurance would not cover these medications.

variable.name: BCBCOST
variable.comment: Have any of the following barriers prevented you from obtaining or taking the prescribed breast cancer medications previously asked about (i.e. tamoxifen, raloxifene, toremifene, anastrazole, exemestane, and letrozole)?: These medications or copayments cost too much.

variable.name: BCBGETTODR
variable.comment: Have any of the following barriers prevented you from obtaining or taking the prescribed breast cancer medications previously asked about (i.e. tamoxifen, raloxifene, toremifene, anastrazole, exemestane, and letrozole)?: It is a problem for me to get to my facility/physician.

variable.name: BCBINCONV
variable.comment: Have any of the following barriers prevented you from obtaining or taking the prescribed breast cancer medications previously asked about (i.e. tamoxifen, raloxifene, toremifene, anastrazole, exemestane, and letrozole)?: Taking these medications would be inconvenient.

variable.name: BCBSIDEEFF
variable.comment: Have any of the following barriers prevented you from obtaining or taking the prescribed breast cancer medications previously asked about (i.e. tamoxifen, raloxifene, toremifene, anastrazole, exemestane, and letrozole)?: I was concerned about possible side effects or complications from these medications.

variable.name: BCBWORK
variable.comment: Have any of the following barriers prevented you from obtaining or taking the prescribed breast cancer medications previously asked about (i.e. tamoxifen, raloxifene, toremifene, anastrazole, exemestane, and letrozole)?: I was concerned about missing work due to taking these medications.

variable.name: BCBFAMILY
variable.comment: Have any of the following barriers prevented you from obtaining or taking the prescribed breast cancer medications previously asked about (i.e. tamoxifen, raloxifene, toremifene, anastrazole, exemestane, and letrozole)?: My family discouraged me from taking these medications.

variable.name: BCBFRIEND
variable.comment: Have any of the following barriers prevented you from obtaining or taking the prescribed breast cancer medications previously asked about (i.e. tamoxifen, raloxifene, toremifene, anastrazole, exemestane, and letrozole)?: My friends discouraged me from taking these medications.

variable.name: BCBTOOMANY
variable.comment: Have any of the following barriers prevented you from obtaining or taking the prescribed breast cancer medications previously asked about (i.e. tamoxifen, raloxifene, toremifene, anastrazole, exemestane, and letrozole)?: I am taking too many medications.

variable.name: BCBDISLIKE
variable.comment: Have any of the following barriers prevented you from obtaining or taking the prescribed breast cancer medications previously asked about (i.e. tamoxifen, raloxifene, toremifene, anastrazole, exemestane, and letrozole)?: I don't like taking medications.

variable.name: BCBNORECOM
variable.comment: Have any of the following barriers prevented you from obtaining or taking the prescribed breast cancer medications previously asked about (i.e. tamoxifen, raloxifene, toremifene, anastrazole, exemestane, and letrozole)?: My physician did not recommend these medications for my particular type of breast disease.

variable.name: BCBOTHER
variable.comment: Have any of the following barriers prevented you from obtaining or taking the prescribed breast cancer medications previously asked about (i.e. tamoxifen, raloxifene, toremifene, anastrazole, exemestane, and letrozole)?: Other

variable.name: F154FINDYS
variable.description: Days since randomization or enrollment to form finish
